QuestData.Title: Bringing the Bass
QuestData.Description:
You know what would boost morale around here?
Bass. Beats. Music!
Everyone loves a party! You go out and get me some hardware, and I'll make a system that will shatter Draenor itself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Bass Blaster, Laz-Tron Disc Reader, Phonic Amplifier, S.P.R.K. Capacitor, and a Cord of Ancient Wood.
